mapper.select: SELECT id FROM test_plan_api_case WHERE test_plan_id = #{testPlanId} ORDER BY pos ASC

select test_plan_api_case.last_exec_result as result, count(test_plan_api_case.id) as resultCount from test_plan_api_case inner join api_test_case on test_plan_api_case.api_case_id = api_test_case.id where test_plan_id = #{0} and api_test_case.deleted = false group by last_exec_result
